ACEFA has two active programs related to decision support:

[Annual Winter Situational Assessment Program 2025](winter-assessment.qmd) – predicting past, current, and short-term future trends in respiratory virus activity to support public health awareness and response. 

[Scenario Modelling Hub 2025](scenario-modelling.qmd) – Generate multi-model evidence to support decision-making on the implementation of public health interventions.
